nodes.text: Pammant was home to Pammant Docks, the location where the Invisible Hand, a Providence-class Dreadnought that served as General Grievous' flagship during the Battle of Coruscant, was constructed by the Free Dac Volunteers Engineering Corps, a Quarren starship manufacturer that aligned itself with the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars.

Pammant was first mentioned in Star Wars: Revenge of the Sith Incredible Cross-Sections, a Star Wars Legends reference book written by Curtis Saxton and illustrated by Hans Jenssen and Richard Chasemore that was released on in 2005. It became canon when it was mentioned in Tarkin, a novel written by James Luceno that was released in 2014.
